ImprovedOutflank.Description: Whenever you and an ally who also has this feat are threatening the same foe, you are considered to be flanking if you are at least perpendicular with your ally.

GangUp.Description: You are considered to be flanking an opponent if at least two of your allies are threatening that opponent, regardless of your actual positioning.

PackFlanking.Description: When you and your companion creature have this feat, and you both threaten the same opponent, you are both considered to be flanking that opponent regardless of your actual positioning.
